name: A dream near the sea
description:
Many thanks to the_catatonic for inspiring me with their pieces. Follow them on twitter or insta.

You can also follow me @IronyDaniel on twitter

Hi! This idea came to me a couple of weeks back after seeing this comic by the_catatonic. By the angles it's, I thought it'd look great as a point'n'click style game. And of course, the horror aspect just sweetens the deal.

It's short, but I've learned a lot about Unity in the process, and I think it's a good rendition of that comic.

... Such as how to jury rig all your assets from an instagram comic ^^; I hope that's okay!
